###  Detecting and Quantifying Macroplastic on Beaches using Drones and AI

This IP describes how [drones equipped with advanced sensors can be used to detect macroplastics](https://obama-next.eu/information-products/#Macroplastics) on beaches. Artificial Intelligence is used to quantify the amount of litter, for instance before and after a beach clean-up event. The SeaBee drone infrastructure has done proof-of-concept studies on this, which still remains to be included in monitoring.
